summary: Are you tired of printing out 15-100 pages of Item ID LIST? I know I am, and getting crashes trying to Alt-Tab to web for list. Well I have the solution this Mod.
descriptionHtml:
Hello

Are you tired of printing out 15-100 pages of Item ID LIST? I know I am, and getting crashes trying to Alt-Tab to web for list. Well I have the solution this Mod.

I\'ve wanted to integrate an IN-GAME Item ID List since Never Winter Nights in the 90\'s, well It took me a long time but I finally did it. First mod for public use, work in progress.

Weapons, Wares, Console Commands, & Food Ingredients/Drinks, Working on  Enchanting & Spells books also locations & npc base ids.

Issues
Still have to add item manually via console ~ Readme for install & books item ID Codes in old version
current version English Only.

Hope You Enjoy
Always Open To Suggestions for My Idea ;-0
author: Ronnie Chapin
